projects.name: rokett
projects.desc: rokett is a final project for my high school course. It is a code editor based on Microsoft's Monaco editor built on top of Electron with the use of technologies like Node & React. I worked on this project for about 1 full school year and, although not finished to the core, it was a truly complex challenge. And it's open-source! It might end up helping someone one day, who knows?

projects.name: APOP
projects.desc: APOP is the Portuguese Association of Professional Organizers, founded in March 2017, with the objective of sharing the idea of professional organizers as a profession. This project consisted on the idealization of the clients ideas UI wise and the implementation of a custom PHP CMS.

projects.name: GitHub User Info
projects.desc: This is a really small Ruby on Rails app made for a Software Engineer interview. It uses GitHub's API v3 to pull data from users, such as followers, public repositories, etc. The focus of this project was on the back-end Rails system.
